#summary Plugin changelog
#labels Featured

= 0.52 =
 * Fixed memory leak issues

= 0.51 =
 * Fixed a minor issue with disabled intermediate progress bar for streaming media. It was showing a tiny 1% green line.

= 0.5 =
 * <b>Album art support</b> (read main page on how to use it)
 * Different text drawing mechanism
 * Small performance tweaks (image and mp3 metadata caching)

= 0.4 =
 * <b>Added transparent (blurred) background</b> for media info display
 * Support for all major image formats: BMP, ICON, GIF, JPEG, Exif, PNG, TIFF, WMF, EMF.

= 0.31 =
 * You can display only a selected image with no text on it, by setting all lines to 'Empty'. The image and the frame won't resize in this case

= 0.3 =
 * <b>Added custom background image option</b>
 * Thumbnail and frame resizing depending on the number of lines of text selected
 * Several minor bugs / compatibility issues

= 0.2 =
 * Fixed the messagebox workaround that made Winamp not to process keyboard events
 * Fixed a bug preventing Winamp to be closed via the system menu
 * Added customizable font size

= 0.1 =
 * Initial release
